long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is a simple popup to show BC Assessment details for BC properties while browsing in Redfin, Zolo, and Realtor.ca.  Install this extension to save the time going back and forth between realtor site and bcAssessment site! :) 

In order to use the extension, browse in any of these sites (for property search):
https://www.redfin.ca
https://www.realtor.ca
https://www.zolo.ca

while looking at a specific property, click on the extension and a popup will show with extra details of the home. This includes the BC Assessment price (current year and previous year), breakdowns of the assessment (building cost and land cost), land size, square footage for each floors, and etc.
